trans-unit.source: Wire payment
trans-unit.target: Bankarsko plaćanje

trans-unit.source: Accept payments by bank transfer.
trans-unit.target: Primamo plaćanje preko bankarskog prenosa.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure about removing these details?
trans-unit.target: Da li ste sigurni da želite da izbrišete vaše podatke?

trans-unit.source: Account owner and account details must be configured before using this module.
trans-unit.target: Vlasnik naloga i detalji moraju biti konfigurisani da bi se pravilno koristioovaj modul.

trans-unit.source: No currency has been set for this module.
trans-unit.target: Valuta nije podešena za ovaj modul

trans-unit.source: Account details are required.
trans-unit.target: Podaci o nalogu su potrebni.

trans-unit.source: Account owner is required.
trans-unit.target: Vlasnik naloga je obavezan.

trans-unit.source: Account details
trans-unit.target: Detalji naloga

trans-unit.source: Account owner
trans-unit.target: Vlasnik računa

trans-unit.source: Such as bank branch, IBAN number, BIC, etc.
trans-unit.target: Kao što su ogranci banke, IBAN broj, BIC, itd.

trans-unit.source: Bank address
trans-unit.target: Adresa Banke

trans-unit.source: Customization
trans-unit.target: Prilagođavanje

trans-unit.source: Reservation period
trans-unit.target: Rezervacioni period

trans-unit.source: Number of days the items remain reserved
trans-unit.target: Broj dana do kada stavke ostaju rezervisane

trans-unit.source: Information to the customer
trans-unit.target: Informacije kupcu

trans-unit.source: Information on the bank transfer (processing time, starting of the shipping...)
trans-unit.target: Informacije o bankovnom transferu (vreme obrade, početak isporuke...)

trans-unit.source: Display the invitation to pay in the order confirmation page
trans-unit.target: Prikažite poziv koji želite platiti na stranici za potvrdu narudžbe

trans-unit.source: Your country's legislation may require you to send the invitation to pay by email only. Disabling the option will hide the invitation on the confirmation page.
trans-unit.target: Zakonodavstvo vaše države može zahtevati da pošaljete poziv samo za elektronsku poštu. Onemogućavanje opcije će sakriti poziv na potvrdnoj stranici.

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to accept secure payments by bank wire.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj modul Vam omogućava da primate plaćanje preko bankarskog prenosa

trans-unit.source: If the client chooses to pay by bank wire, the order status will change to 'Waiting for Payment'.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko se klijent opredeli za ovaj model plaćanja, porudžbina će promeniti svoj status u 'Čekajanje uplate'.

trans-unit.source: That said, you must manually confirm the order upon receiving the bank wire.
trans-unit.target: Dakle, morate manualno da potvrdite porudžbinu čim primite prenos novca.
